attributes.action: Remove the media silence around the case of Hollie Greig's abuse so she and her mother can find justice!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Hollie Greig is a young girl born with Down Syndrome.  She, with her mother, fled Scotland for their own safety and now live in England.  Hollie’s abuse was perpetrated by high ranking members of the Scottish establishment and her abusers, to this day, continue to be protected by the same establishment.  This must end! Hollie’s abusers must be brought to book and those who allowed this scandal to go un-checked must be held accountable. Full story here… http://www.davidicke.com/articles/child-abuse-mainmenu-74/30693-scottish-paedophile-ring-exposed and here... http://www.ukcolumn.org/2010/02/02/child-rapists-protected-by-the-state/

rejection.details: This is a devolved matter and should be directed to the Scottish Executive.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
